verses.verse: Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their armies <S%H4264><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>, and were gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%> at Shochoh <S%H7755><s%>, which belongeth to Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> between Shochoh <S%H7755><s%> and Azekah <S%H5825><s%>, in Ephesdammim <S%H658><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> were gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Elah <S%H425><s%>, and set the battle <S%H4421><s%> in array <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on a mountain <S%H2022><s%> on the one side, and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on a mountain <S%H2022><s%> on the other side: and there was a valley <S%H1516><s%> between them.

And there went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a champion <S%H376><s%> <S%H1143><s%> out of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, named <S%H8034><s%> Goliath <S%H1555><s%>, of Gat <S%H1661><s%>, whose height <S%H1363><s%> was six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> and a span <S%H2239><s%>.

And he had an helmet <S%H3553><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>, and he was armed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with a coat <S%H8302><s%> of mail <S%H7193><s%>; and the weight <S%H4948><s%> of the coat <S%H8302><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>.
And he had greaves <S%H4697><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> upon his legs <S%H7272><s%>, and a target <S%H3591><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> between his shoulders <S%H3802><s%>.

And the staff <S%H6086><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H2671><s%> of his spear <S%H2595><s%> was like a weaver's <S%H707><s%> <S%H8802><s%> beam <S%H4500><s%>; and his spear's <S%H2595><s%> head <S%H3852><s%> weighed six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>: and one bearing <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> a shield <S%H6793><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him.

And he stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and cried <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the armies <S%H4634><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Why are ye come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to set your battle <S%H4421><s%> in array <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8800><s%>? am not I a Philistine <S%H6430><s%>, and ye servants <S%H5650><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%>? choose <S%H1262><s%> <S%H8798><s%> you a man <S%H376><s%> for you, and let him come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to me.

If he be able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> with me, and to kill <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me, then will we be your servants <S%H5650><s%>: but if I prevail <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against him, and kill <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him, then shall ye be our servants <S%H5650><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> us.

And the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I defy <S%H2778><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the armies <S%H4634><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>; give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me a man <S%H376><s%>, that we may fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8735><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

When Saul <S%H7586><s%> and all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> those words <S%H1697><s%> of the Philistine <S%H6430><s%>, they were dismayed <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and greatly <S%H3966><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Now David <S%H1732><s%> was the son <S%H1121><s%> of that Ephrathite <S%H376><s%> <S%H673><s%> of Beit-Lechemjudah <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Yishai <S%H3448><s%>; and he had eight <S%H8083><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>: and the man <S%H376><s%> went <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> among men <S%H582><s%> for an old man <S%H2204><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>.

And the three <S%H7969><s%> eldest <S%H1419><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Yishai <S%H3448><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and followed <S%H310><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> to the battle <S%H4421><s%>: and the names <S%H8034><s%> of his three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> that went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the battle <S%H4421><s%> were Eliab <S%H446><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, and next <S%H4932><s%> unto him Abinadab <S%H41><s%>, and the third <S%H7992><s%> Shammah <S%H8048><s%>.
And David <S%H1732><s%> was the youngest <S%H6996><s%>: and the three <S%H7969><s%> eldest <S%H1419><s%> followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H310><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>.

But David <S%H1732><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8802><s%> from Saul <S%H7586><s%> to feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> at Beit-Lechem <S%H1035><s%>.

And the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> drew near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%> morning <S%H7925><s%> <S%H8687><s%> and evening <S%H6150><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and presented <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8691><s%> himself forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And Yishai <S%H3448><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now for thy brethren <S%H251><s%> an ephah <S%H374><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> parched <S%H7039><s%> corn, and these ten <S%H6235><s%> loaves <S%H3899><s%>, and run <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8685><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> to thy brethren <S%H251><s%>;

And carry <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> these ten <S%H6235><s%> cheeses <S%H2461><s%> <S%H2757><s%> unto the captain <S%H8269><s%> of their thousand <S%H505><s%>, and look <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%> how thy brethren <S%H251><s%> fare <S%H7965><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their pledge <S%H6161><s%>.

Now Saul <S%H7586><s%>, and they, and all the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, were in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Elah <S%H425><s%>, fighting <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8737><s%> with the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and left <S%H5203><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%> with a keeper <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and took <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, as Yishai <S%H3448><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> him; and he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the trench <S%H4570><s%>, as the host <S%H2428><s%> was going forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to the fight <S%H4634><s%>, and shouted <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8689><s%> for the battle <S%H4421><s%>.
For Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had put the battle in array <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, army <S%H4634><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> army <S%H4634><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> left <S%H5203><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his carriage <S%H3627><s%> in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the keeper <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the carriage <S%H3627><s%>, and ran <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the army <S%H4634><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and saluted <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H7965><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%>.

And as he talked <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8764><s%> with them, behold, there came up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the champion <S%H376><s%> <S%H1143><s%>, the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> of Gat <S%H1661><s%>, Goliath <S%H1555><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%>, out of the armies <S%H4634><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H4630><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> according to the same <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%>: and David <S%H1732><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them.

And all the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, when they saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the man <S%H376><s%>, fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from him <S%H6440><s%>, and were sore <S%H3966><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Have ye seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this man <S%H376><s%> that is come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8802><s%>? surely to defy <S%H2778><s%> <S%H8763><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> is he come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: and it shall be, that the man <S%H376><s%> who killeth <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him, the king <S%H4428><s%> will enrich <S%H6238><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him with great <S%H1419><s%> riches <S%H6239><s%>, and will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him his daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> free <S%H2670><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the men <S%H582><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by him, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, What shall be done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> that killeth <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> this <S%H1975><s%> Philistine <S%H6430><s%>, and taketh away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> from Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>? for who is this uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> Philistine <S%H6430><s%>, that he should defy <S%H2778><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the armies <S%H4634><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> ?

And the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him after this manner <S%H1697><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, So shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> that killeth <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him.

And Eliab <S%H446><s%> his eldest <S%H1419><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> when he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto the men <S%H582><s%>; and Eliab's <S%H446><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against David <S%H1732><s%>, and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Why camest thou down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> hither? and with whom hast thou left <S%H5203><s%> <S%H8804><s%> those <S%H2007><s%> few <S%H4592><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>? I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy pride <S%H2087><s%>, and the naughtiness <S%H7455><s%> of thine heart <S%H3824><s%>; for thou art come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that thou mightest see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the battle <S%H4421><s%>.
And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What have I now done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? Is there not a cause <S%H1697><s%> ?

And he turned <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8735><s%> from him <S%H681><s%> toward <S%H4136><s%> another <S%H312><s%>, and spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after the same manner <S%H1697><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H1697><s%> him again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> after the former <S%H7223><s%> manner <S%H1697><s%>.

And when the words <S%H1697><s%> were heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8735><s%> which David <S%H1732><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, they rehearsed <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>: and he sent <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for him.

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%>, Let no man's <S%H120><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> fail <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> because of him; thy servant <S%H5650><s%> will go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8738><s%> with this Philistine <S%H6430><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%>, Thou art not able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> against this Philistine <S%H6430><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> with him: for thou art but a youth <S%H5288><s%>, and he a man <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> from his youth <S%H5271><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Saul <S%H7586><s%>, Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> kept <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and there came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%>, and a bear <S%H1677><s%>, and took <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a lamb <S%H7716><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H2089><s%> out of the flock <S%H5739><s%>:

And I went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him, and delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it out of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>: and when he arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against me, I caught <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him by his beard <S%H2206><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him, and slew <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him.

Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> both the lion <S%H738><s%> and the bear <S%H1677><s%>: and this uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> Philistine <S%H6430><s%> shall be as one <S%H259><s%> of them, seeing he hath defied <S%H2778><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the armies <S%H4634><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> moreover, The YY <S%H3068><s%> that delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me out of the paw <S%H3027><s%> of the lion <S%H738><s%>, and out of the paw <S%H3027><s%> of the bear <S%H1677><s%>, he will deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of this Philistine <S%H6430><s%>. And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and the YY <S%H3068><s%> be with thee.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> armed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8686><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> with his armour <S%H4055><s%>, and he put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> an helmet <S%H6959><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>; also he armed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him with a coat of mail <S%H8302><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> girded <S%H2296><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%> upon his armour <S%H4055><s%>, and he assayed <S%H2974><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; for he had not proved <S%H5254><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it. And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Saul <S%H7586><s%>, I cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with these; for I have not proved <S%H5254><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them. And David <S%H1732><s%> put <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them off him.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his staff <S%H4731><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and chose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him five <S%H2568><s%> smooth <S%H2512><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> out of the brook <S%H5158><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them in a shepherd's <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> bag <S%H3627><s%> which he had, even in a scrip <S%H3219><s%>; and his sling <S%H7050><s%> was in his hand <S%H3027><s%>: and he drew near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the Philistine <S%H6430><s%>.

And the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and drew near <S%H7131><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>; and the man <S%H376><s%> that bare <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the shield <S%H6793><s%> went before <S%H6440><s%> him.

And when the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> looked about <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, he disdained <S%H959><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him: for he was but a youth <S%H5288><s%>, and ruddy <S%H132><s%>, and of a fair <S%H3303><s%> countenance <S%H4758><s%>.

And the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>, Am I a dog <S%H3611><s%>, that thou comest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to me with staves <S%H4731><s%>? And the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> cursed <S%H7043><s%> <S%H8762><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> by his 'elohim <S%H430><s%>.
